actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to suspend the duties on circular knitting machines designed for sweater strip or garment length knitting until the close of December 31, 1989.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1989, the duty on circular knitting machines designed for sweater or garment length knitting.

titles.title: A bill to suspend the duties on circular knitting machines designed for sweater strip or garment length knitting until the close of December 31, 1989.
